Description: Bone or ivory counter with a caricatured portrait of a man: the man has a bulging brow, long pointed nose and a balding crown with a plait of hair hanging at the back. On the reverse is lightly incised the numeral VIIII and a reversed C with a dot in the centre.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: S. Walker & P. Higgs [eds.], 'Cleopatra of Egypt' (London, 2001), p. 317 [331].
Bibliographic references: Walker & Higgs 2001 / Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth (331)
